entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
